backend/main.mo: Actor exposing a simple healthCheck query returning a static service status string.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their purpose across UI, storage, media, and state management.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the app title to Aspen Clinic Snap and mounting the root React element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling initialization, PIN lock flow, auto‑lock, theming, and loading ClinicalSnapShell.
frontend/src/components/camera/CameraCap: Full‑screen camera component managing permissions, timeouts, capture flow, and saving photos to app state.
frontend/src/components/layout/ClinicalS: Primary UI shell with header, resizable panels, and overlays for settings, camera, voice memos, photo viewer, and comparisons.
frontend/src/components/patients/Patient: Confirmation dialog for deleting a patient with warnings about cascading data removal.
Modal form for creating or editing a patient, managing input state and saving via the app store.
Displays searchable, sortable patient list with selection and create-patient dialog control.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoAnno: Canvas overlay that renders existing annotations and captures pen-drawn annotations for a photo.
Toolbar for selecting annotation tools, colors, sizes, and clearing annotations for a photo.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoThum: Grid of photo thumbnails for a session with selection and deletion options.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoView: Full-screen photo viewer with zoom/pan and annotation mode integrating toolbar and canvas.
frontend/src/components/photos/SessionPh: Button that imports image files into a session, validates them, saves them sequentially, and shows toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/security/PinLock: PIN entry screen with keypad that verifies a PIN through a callback and displays errors.
frontend/src/components/sessions/Session: Alert dialog asking the user to confirm deletion of a session and all its related data.
Dialog for creating or editing a session with title, date, and treatment type fields, including save logic and error handling.
frontend/src/components/settings/AboutLo: Static info panel explaining the app’s local‑only data storage and privacy notes.
frontend/src/components/settings/Brandin: Panel allowing users to edit clinic name and logo, including custom logo upload and preview.
frontend/src/components/settings/Privacy: Panel for configuring PIN lock settings and auto‑lock timeout, with PIN validation and hashing.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Right‑side settings sheet with tabs for branding, privacy, treatments, and about sections.
frontend/src/components/settings/Treatme: UI component for listing, creating, editing, and deleting treatment types with dialogs and form fields.
frontend/src/components/viewer/BeforeAft: Dialog allowing users to pick before/after photos from a session and view them in a comparison slider.
Interactive slider that reveals before and after images by dragging a divider.
frontend/src/components/viewer/SessionTi: Displays a patient’s sessions and photos with options to edit sessions, manage patients, import photos, and open tools like camera or comparison.
frontend/src/components/voice/VoiceMemoP: Panel for recording, saving, playing, pausing, and deleting voice memos linked to a session.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePanZoom.ts: Implements a touch-friendly pan and zoom hook supporting drag, wheel zoom, and pinch gestures for images.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a clinical-themed color system with custom utilities and scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/lib/media/audioMemo.ts: Provides an AudioRecorder class for capturing audio memos and utilities to convert audio data to URLs.
frontend/src/lib/media/photoStorage.ts: Processes image files into full-resolution and thumbnail data with validation and helper utilities for loading and converting images.
frontend/src/lib/models.ts: Defines TypeScript domain models for patients, sessions, media, annotations, settings, and default treatment types.
frontend/src/lib/search/filtering.ts: Implements filtering utilities for patients and sessions based on query, treatment types, and date ranges.
frontend/src/lib/security/pinLock.ts: Provides PIN hashing and verification plus an AutoLockManager for inactivity-based app locking.
frontend/src/lib/state/useAppStore.ts: Zustand-based global store managing patients, sessions, photos, annotations, pairings, treatment types, voice memos, settings, and all CRUD actions tied to IndexedDB.
frontend/src/lib/storage/indexedDb.ts: IndexedDB wrapper providing initialization, object store setup, and generic CRUD helpers for all clinical data models.
frontend/src/lib/storage/migrations.ts: Runs initial database migrations, inserting default treatment types and app settings on first launch.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color variables, plugins, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Project state metadata documenting schema version, app summary, architecture notes, known issues, required images, and feature listings.
